notes:
# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Power

I always pick  [Threads of Fate](item_cb61612b-9d83-49a9-989d-013bf084fbcb)  as a first power, just because you get so much value out of it on the first round.

## Items

You want to pick  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0)  because it increases your healing **output**.  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf)  increases how **fast** you heal.  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da)  is so you can stay **alive** a bit more and regenerate your HP quickly during fights. If you prefer/are more used to it, you can grab  [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) instead, but 25 shields + faster regen is better in general AND you're gonna want to keep  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf)  and  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) no matter which survivability perk you choose.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089) :
You're not supposed to stay on the objective, you're supposed to stick with whoever is doing the most amount of damage.

- Beginning of rounds/Death perks:
It's not that it's bad but there are better options out there. (+ You're not supposed to be dying as mercy so if you're dying maybe put your money in survivability over death perks)

- Lifesteal/Ammo/Elimination perks: 
During the first round you want to play like a good little mercy so you can scope out the enemy team and then eventually build DPS mercy if that's what your team needs.

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Items

You want to pick   [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) absolutely 100% no doubt, but only if you can also get ***ATLEAST***  [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) . If you can't get those two together, get only  [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) with weapon power. With this build, you're gonna want to keep your weapon power and Attack Speed relatively identical.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  Purple perks :
I find that usually during the second round, you can get a lot more value out of building with blues and greens than having a single purple perk or a purple perk with some greens. (Even chain Evoker, which will be taken around round 3)

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

- [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) :
Since we're doing a DMG amp focused build, if your dps is dying too much, you need to heal him more. So focus on your healing output, not your rez.

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Power

As a second power, I usually ALWAYS pick Triage Unit. It saves lives SO often. Since this is a Pocket Build, if you heal faster/more, it means more time dmg amping !

## Items

You're gonna want to try to add  [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) to your build on 3rd round. (AGAIN THIS BUILD IS ONLY IF UR DPS ARE CRAZY OTHERWISE YOU'RE LOWKEY THROWING BECAUSE YOU'RE GETTING NO VALUE OUT OF DMG AMPING) Even if you have to sell  [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054) and get a green instead, you're gonna want to get chain evoker to increase the dmg your dps are doing since 3rd round is usually the round where people get more powerfull and start doing a lot more damage. This power can turn the match around.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  General:
In all honnesty, in general, if you're doing the pocket build, you're gonna want to do exactly as I've described to get as much value out of it as possible. If you're dying too much, you can still get  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931), but in general you're gonna want to position yourself better depending on what DPS/Tank they have so you die a lot less.

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Items

Around the 4th round I usually still don't have any money to add anything major, if you can switch out  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) for  [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124), then perfect, do it because it'll allow you to spend more time dmg boosting. Other than that, pick  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) if you're dying too much and add Weapon power / Attack speed, keeping it as balanced as possible once again.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Powers

 [Distortion](item_5557e2f2-02df-4eac-8128-0c23b71183b1) for the pocket build because once again, it helps to be damage boosting more than healing. (Reminder that this build is ***ENTIRELY*** DMG-BOOST focused)

## Items

For the 5th round, you want to have  [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) ,  [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) and AS perk. You MAY have enough money for  [Booster Jets](item_a291de85-b6d9-43cf-b5da-f3184a156f48)  which is awesome if you do; Otherwise, run the other two attack speed perks. If you  need more movement, sell  [Chain Evoker](item_812cc89e-feb0-47d0-9e03-9d8e33a80aca) and  [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) And buy both  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931)  and  [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5) . Literally the best movement you can have on mercy on stadium, less than 1s cooldown + launches very far. Can also be useful for healing if u GA every 3s to someone low, your healing with be constantly up 30%. You can also pick the same green items if you dont have enough money for any blues towards the end or if you have more money you can pick any blue/purple in the optional items.

## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .
-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

- [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b)  and  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) :
You don't want to pick these two quite yet. Later in the next two rounds of course you can, but for now you want to stick with the other perks.

-  [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) :
With all the powers we've chosen so far, you're supposed to be able to keep up your team while still pocketing. If you're rezzing too much / needing a rez perk to not die while rezzing, maybe those rezzes are not worth it/too dangerous OR focus on more healing perks to not have to rez. (THIS IS NOT A TAKE AGAINST REZ BUILDS, IF YOU WANT A REZ BUILD, THERE IS ONE ON MY PROFILE !! IT'S HEAL/REZ BALANCED. IF YOU DO A POCKET BUILD YOU WANT TO FOCUS ON KEEPING ALIVE NOT REZZING)

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Items

For the 6th round, you're gonna want to fit as many purple perks as you can. If you don't need to die less, don't pick the movement purples that are optional but  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b)  and  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) . ONLY if you already have the 4 purples that are already in the list. You want to be using GA as much as possible to get maximum value out of  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) . The reason for picking that perk instead of  [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce)  for example, is that 1. It ends up adding the same amount of Weapon Boost if you use GA often enough, which I do, and 2. You also get 10% Cooldown. So it gives more while costing less, which to me sounds like a great deal !


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

-  [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) :
With all the powers we've chosen so far, you're supposed to be able to keep up your team while still pocketing. If you're rezzing too much / needing a rez perk to not die while rezzing, maybe those rezzes are not worth it/too dangerous OR focus on more healing perks to not have to rez. (THIS IS NOT A TAKE AGAINST REZ BUILDS, IF YOU WANT A REZ BUILD, THERE IS ONE ON MY PROFILE !! IT'S HEAL/REZ BALANCED. IF YOU DO A POCKET BUILD YOU WANT TO FOCUS ON KEEPING ALIVE NOT REZZING)

# About this build

If ur dps are crazy, you can use this pocket build. (You can switch it out for Healing/DPS build if DPS are doing bad when at 3rd power, just look on my profile for those builds)

## Power

For the last power, once more, the goal is to keep your dps alive, so doing damage reduction on the person you pocket is a great power.

## Items

A grouping of all the purple items we've spoken about throughout this build ! You can switch out [The Closer](item_173c6d0f-dbe6-440e-924f-0ce08189ddce) and/or  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) if you need to die less, but once again, this is the build I recommend for pocketing a DPS. If you still dont have enough for all of the purples, you can keep putting in some of the blues from the previous rounds, keeping in mind you want to have ***atleast*** 20% AS.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

-  [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) :
With all the powers we've chosen so far, you're supposed to be able to keep up your team while still pocketing. If you're rezzing too much / needing a rez perk to not die while rezzing, maybe those rezzes are not worth it/too dangerous OR focus on more healing perks to not have to rez. (THIS IS NOT A TAKE AGAINST REZ BUILDS, IF YOU WANT A REZ BUILD, THERE IS ONE ON MY PROFILE !! IT'S HEAL/REZ BALANCED. IF YOU DO A POCKET BUILD YOU WANT TO FOCUS ON KEEPING ALIVE NOT REZZING)

- Any survival perks -
Like mentioned in the 'Items' section, if you want to survive more, pick movement. It gives you a lot more survivability than any other surviving perks.
